definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: When he was giving a lecture, more than ten of his students stood aside respectfully.
sentences.chinese: 他演講時，他的十幾號弟子都畢恭畢敬地立在一旁。

sentences.english: OK. Where is the boarding gate for our plane?
sentences.chinese: 好的。我們的飛機在幾號登機門？

sentences.english: Which platform for London Bridge, please?
sentences.chinese: 請問，到倫敦橋該上幾號站臺？

sentences.english: May I have your name and your room number, sir?
sentences.chinese: 請問先生尊姓大名，住幾號房間？

sentences.english: What number should I dial for information?
sentences.chinese: 我要打給服務檯應該撥幾號？

sentences.english: What is the area code for the city of san francisco please?
sentences.chinese: 請問，三藩市地區域號碼是幾號？

sentences.english: Mark: When do you send out the monthly statements?
sentences.chinese: 你們一般都是幾號寄出月度的結算單？

sentences.english: 'What's the cut-off order date for free shipping?'
sentences.chinese: 你們提供的免費送貨時間最後下訂單期限是幾號？

sentences.english: What's the date of May Day according to the lunar calendar this year?
